game.name: Carmen Sandiego
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The scarlet super thief Carmen Sandiego is back! Adorn Carmen’s signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilizing high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capturing VILE.
